find_citation_candidates

A pandoc filter to search for citation candidates, understood as 4-digit strings followed by an optional lowercase letter. Candidates are output to a text file for further processing.

Functions

finalize(doc)

Write the gathered information to an external file, citation_candidates.txt.

find_remaining_citations(elem, doc)

Walk pandoc's AST and check all strings for occurrence of the typical APA citation pattern.

main([doc])

prepare(doc)

find_citation_candidates.find_remaining_citations(elem, doc)[source]

Walk pandoc’s AST and check all strings for occurrence of the typical APA citation pattern.

Exclude strings that appear within Citations or Links.
